question: Arrange the following compounds in their decreasing order of reactivity towards Nucleophilic addition reaction.
<katex>$CH_{3}COCH_{3}, CH_{3}COC_{2}H_{5}, CH_{3}CHO$</katex>
explanation: Reactivity depends on the magnitude of positive charge on the carbonyl carbon and steric hindrance.
Aldehydes are more reactive than ketones.
